name: Case Closed (itch)
description:
Point & Click game (prototype),  made during the Global Game Jam 2022, in Rosario, Argentina. It's an MVP (Minimum Viable Product).

Programación: Nicolas Becerra - Renzo Scotta.

Arte: Maximiliano Dana.

Guion: Juan Sebastian Cabrera, Emmanuel Gazza.

Música y SFX: Renzo Scotta
